sentence.text: Best , wish it have some more options to alarm us about windspeed and related , preset a preferred windspeed and related values and notify us when the threshold is breached
Sounding the alarm by connecting us to nature .
Displays correct location scrolling across screen , but map ALWAYS shows tablet location 35 - 50 miles away rendering app virtually useless .
We have a tornado warning with no alarm sounded and no local news coverage for said weather .
Once familiar with extended functions it 's very good , and that is also for the full web service .
This app is great ðŸ‘Œ but there 's a one problem I set alarm of remind me before 1 hour but when I check it again it 's turned into 10 minutes automatically so do something
Clock time freezes also if you tap the clock it does n't go to clock and timers like other weather widgets do
Horrible ads , clicking on clock does n't redirect to alarms .
Good luck .add some clock widget too
A ALARM FOR RAIN .
Best application for weather & clock widget
Absolutely everything I wanted in a weather appp with clock and alarm functionality !!
There is also a ghost alarm that daily displays on the widget " 10:21 am " .
Neither of which has an alarm set for that time .
Always my first choice for weather and clock widget on every of my phones and tablet .
The only down side is the text is too small for info like next alarm , min/max temp , sunrise / set etc .
Use the large widget on my homescreen for time , weather , and alarms .
Random alarm time is stuck on widget , for weeks .
Love this app but the widget has n't been showing the correct alarm since forever !
Works fine on most phones , but does n't recognize the clock app on my Nord200 so can't set the widget to go directly to my clock app to set alarms , etc .
Your alarm will not go off when you expect .
After last update my alarm on screen is stuck on some random time i never used .
Just does n't show the right time of the alarms in the app widgets
No Percentage of rain Just Precipitation other wise a has some great features like clock / calendar and and weather with alarm ..
The alarm clocks are n't working correctly .
I will be finding a new alarm clock .
For me this widget is the best because of how clear the widged is and you set alarm and see your calendar for free .
Big clock widget for Android , everyone must install .
Just upgraded to a new S22 Ultra and seem to have lost the ability to show 12 hour format ( zero appears as first digit ) on the large clock widget .
Best combo weather clock widget I 've found
It is a weather and clock widget so time should be accurate

My review of this app went from 5 stars down to 3 , ( which may be too generous ) , because the widgets will now , quite often , not actually keep the right time , which is kind of important for a clock widget to do !
Poorly designed , treats pollen same as tornado for alarms .
Absolutely ridiculous that alarms show for common sense items .
I love the five day forecast with my next alarm visible .
I 've had this app for years and love the 5 day forecast , date , time , alarm everything about it until the last update .
I can't find any other weather / clock widget that is near as good as this one .
Not even the alarm .
Widget never updates and you can't click on the clock and choose alarms like before .
Really nice weather app , one of the best I 've tried also with nice clock widget .
Very basic without audible alarms of approaching storms .
Also allows you to access Calendar Alarms and Weather just by touching .
The best weather and clock widget .
Next alarm does n't work properly with alarm clock extreme .
Have been using it for a while without fault , recently tried to change the alarm app which opens when you tap on the widget .
Hopefully next update allows you to add a link to 3rd party alarms and calendars .
App needs an urgent update to fix bugs .. unable to press the Clock Face on widget to set an alarm as this is not working at all .
Keeping it just for the clock widget .
I no longer can set Alarm Clock Xtreme as the widget 's default clock app .
My favorite weather and clock widget .
The " shake to submit feedback " was appearing constantly , even though my phone was lying perfectly still , rendering the app unusable .
The search option does not appear to work therefore rendering it impossible to use widgets for specific locations .
I love how easy it is to review and set alarm levels .
Only additional feature I would ask for is to set multiple locations to watch ( preferrably with their own alarm settings ) .
SWA is VERY on the ball , sounding the alarm no more than a minute or two within the time of warning issuance .

Despite being set to play a " blaring " alarm in emergency situations , this app stayed completely silent while I was in the direct path of major tornados and extreme storms on the night of december 10th .
They give you a loud alarm on your phone a head of time to take shelter now in your area .
Needs a option to remove the leading zero on the clock along with being selected to use the default alarm clock and not forced to download the MY Alarm clock app .
Mannual timer for Auto update option should be there .
Poor rendering on my Samsung Note 20 .
No wornin alarms hard to read
It 'd be great to have the option to touch the clock to bring up a choice of timer , stop watch , alarm ( standard clock features ) .

One thing that I think would make it better and easier is widgets that show time and weather should feature tapping the clock portion to take you to your phone 's default clock app so you can easily set alarm etc .
Also would be great if the bigger time / weather widgets show if alarm has been set and for what time .
It freezes and crashes during open , rendering this app useless ; and none of the widgets settings stay saved .
I was annoyed that it kept setting my alarm .
It took me a while to track down the fact that this app was responsible for the mystery alarm .
no user configurable alarm level ( for ex. at 150 ppm ) instead of ringing at any time .
